maqras.text: 36|60|he aadam kee santaan! kya mainne tumase bal dekar nahin kaha tha ki ibaadat (vandana) na karana shaitaan kee? vaastav mein, vah tumhaara khula shatru hai.
36|61|tatha ibaadat (vandana) karana meree hee, yahee seedhee dagar hai.
36|62|tatha vah kupath kar chuka hai, tumamen se bahut-se samudaayon ko, to kya tum samajhate nahee ho
36|63|yahee narak hai, jisaka vachan tumhen diya ja raha tha.
36|64|aaj, pravesh kar jao usamen, us kufr ke badale, jo tum kar rahe the.
36|65|aaj, ham muhar (mudra) laga denge unake mukhon par aur hamase baat karenge unake haath tatha saakshy (gavaahee) denge unake pair, unake karmon kee, jo ve kar rahe the.
36|66|aur yadi ham chaahate, to unakee aankhen andhee kar dete. phir ve daudate sangaarg kee or, parantu kahaan se dekhate
36|67|aur yadi ham chaahate, to vikrt kar dete unhen, unake sthaan par, to na ve aage ja sakate the, na peechhe phir sakate the.
36|68|tatha jise ham adhik aayu dete hain, use utpatti mein, pratham dasha[1] kee or pher dete hain. to kya ve samajhate nahin hain
36|69|aur hamane nahin sikhaaya nabee ko kaavy[1] aur na ye unake lie yogy hai. ye to maatr, ek shiksha tatha khula quraan hai.
36|70|taaki vo sachet karen, use jo jeevit ho[1] tatha sidhd ho jaaye yaatana kee baat, kaafiron par.
36|71|kya manushy ne nahin dekha ki hamane paida kiye hain unake lie usamen se, jise banaaya hai hamaare haathon ne chaupaaye. to ve unake svaamee hain
36|72|tatha hamane vash mein kar diya unhen, unake, to unamen se kuchh unakee savaaree hain tatha unamen se kuchh ko ve khaate hain.
36|73|tatha unake lie unamen bahut-se laabh tatha pey hain. to kya (phir bhee) ve krtagy nahin hote
36|74|aur unhonne bana liya allaah ke siva bahut-se poojy ki sambhavatah, ve unakee sahaayata karenge.
36|75|ve svayan apanee sahaayata nahin kar sakenge tatha ve unakee sena hain, (yaatana) mein[1] upasthit.
36|76|atah, aapako udaaseen na kare unakee baat. vastutah, ham jaanate hain, jo ve man mein rakhate hain tatha jo bolate hain.
36|77|aur kya nahin dekha manushy ne ki paida kiya hamane use veery se? phir bhee vah khula jhagadaaloo hai.
36|78|aur usane varnan kiya hamaare lie ek udaaharan, aur apanee utpatti ko bhool gaya. usane kahaah kaun jeevit karega in asthiyon ko, jabaki ve jeern ho chukee hongee
36|79|aap kah den: vahee, jisane paida kiya hai pratham baar aur vah pratyek utpatti ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanane vaala hai.
36|80|jisane bana dee tumhaare lie hare vrksh se agni, to tum usase aag[1] sulagaate ho.
36|81|tatha kya jisane aakaashon tatha dharatee ko paida kiya hai vah saamarthy nahin rakhata isapar ki paida kare usake samaan? kyon nahin jabaki vah rachayita, ati gyaata hai
36|82|usaka aadesh, jab vah kisee cheez ko astitv pradaan karana chaahe, to bas ye kah dena haih ho ja. tatkshan vah ho jaatee hai.
36|83|to pavitr hai vah, jisake haath mein pratyek vastu ka raajy hai aur tumasab usee kee or phere[1] jaoge.
37|1|shapath hai panktivadhd (farishton) kee
37|2|phir jhidakiyaan dene vaalon kee
37|3|phir smaran karake padhane vaalon[1] kee
37|4|nishchay tumhaara poojy, ek hee hai.
37|5|aakaashon tatha dharatee ka paalanahaar tatha jo kuchh unake madhy hai aur suryoday hone ke sthaanon ka rab.
37|6|hamane alankrt kiya hai sansaar (sameep) ke aakaash ko, taaron kee shobha se.
37|7|tatha raksha karane ke lie pratyek udhdat shaitaan se.
37|8|vah nahin sun sakate (jaakar) uchch sabha tak farishton kee baat tatha maare jaate hain, pratyek disha se.
37|9|raandane ke lie tatha unake lie sthaayee yaatana hai.
37|10|parantu, jo le ude kuchh, to peechha karatee hai usaka dahakatee jvaala.
37|11|to aap in (kaafiron) se prashn karen ki kya unhen paida karana adhik kathin hai ya jinhen[1] hamane paida kiya hai? hamane unhen[2] paida kiya hai, lesadaar mittee se.
37|12|balki aapane aashchary kiya (unake asveekaar par) tatha ve upahaas karate hain.
37|13|aur jab shiksha dee jaaye, to ve shiksha grahan nahin karate.
37|14|aur jab dekhate hain koee nishaanee, to upahaas karane lagate hain.
37|15|tatha kahate hen ki ye to maatr khula jaadoo hai.
37|16|(kahate hain ki) kya, jab ham mar jaayenge tatha mittee aur haddiyaan ho jaayenge, to ham nishchay punah jeevit kiye jaayenge
37|17|aur kya, hamaare pahale poorvaj bhee (jeevit kiye jaayenge)
37|18|aap kah den ki haan tatha tum apamaanit (bhee) hoge
37|19|vo to bas ek jhidakee hogee, phir sahasa ve dekh rahe honge.
37|20|tatha kahengeh haay hamaara vinaash! ye to badale (pralay) ka din hai.
37|21|yahee nirnay ka din hai, jise tum jhuthala rahe the.
